mapper.select: select bu.buyer_id, tr.purchase_no, bu.talent_no, tr.refund_bamboo, tr.issue, tr.refund_status, tr.approve_date from talent_refund tr, bamboo_use bu where tr.purchase_no = bu.purchase_no and tr.refund_status = '검토중'

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT bu.buyer_id, tr.purchase_no, bu.talent_no, tr.refund_bamboo, tr.issue, tr.refund_status, tr.approve_date, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY tr.approve_date DESC) AS rnum FROM talent_refund tr, bamboo_use bu WHERE tr.purchase_no = bu.purchase_no AND tr.refund_status = '검토중' ) WHERE rnum BETWEEN #{startRow} AND #{endRow}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM talent_refund tr INNER JOIN bamboo_use bu ON tr.purchase_no = bu.purchase_no WHERE tr.refund_status = '검토중'
